Title: How to Avoid the Daily Grind at Work with Rabbi Daniel Lapin
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Rabbi Daniel Lapin. Rabbi Lapin is known as America's Rabbi. He’s a rabbinic scholar, international speaker and bestselling author. He shares how showing up day after day is the key to success, plus how to balance that with long-term planning for your desired future. Later in the episode, George chats with Blake Thompson, a Ramsey Solutions board member and the executive vice president of Ramsey Network.  Blake talks about the importance of being faithful in the little things and how it can lead to huge success. He also explains the importance of having core values for your team.

 

You’ll learn:

  • Why you shouldn’t tolerate the daily grind
  • The key to staying focused on your goals
  • The two habits every leader needs
  • What to do every day to be successful
